title: Spend Your Summer at the Lake
posting_body: ['The Vista is nestled on the breathtaking shores of Lake Erie and offers 21 floors of lakefront living space.', 'Each suite offers our residents gorgeous views of Lake Erie or the greater Euclid community.', 'Located just 10 minutes from Cleveland, The Vista residents enjoy a short commute Downtown for exciting sporting events, shopping, and nightlife, as well as a quick commute to all eastern suburbs.', 'Apply online at <URL> or call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a personal tour.', 'Community Amenities:', '*Brand New Fitness Center', '*New State of the Art Package Center', '*Cable and WiFi Included', '*Underground Parking Facility Available', '*Laundry Facility in Each Building', '*Controlled Access Building', '*Cafe & Convenience Store On-Site', '*Online Resident Portal', '*Quick Access to Public Transportation', '*On-Site Management & Maintenance', "The Vista is under new management, don't miss out on all the exciting changes and complete your application today!"]
